
                            
                            <p>搞活动搞了乱七八糟的，闪购送我一堆卷诱惑我，结果只能用一张，浪费我半个多小时，拼了四五个店都不减，结果找客服说一个人只能用一张，我就想问，不能用你送我这么多卷干嘛， <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/27/085552raueja7z00e722j5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/27/085552raueja7z00e722j5.jpg"> </p>
